title: Luna's First Day at Magic School

school_entrance.text: Luna stands in front of the grand Magic School. The large doors are decorated with sparkling stars. A friendly teacher approaches with a welcoming smile.

courtyard.text: The courtyard has a beautiful fountain with floating water drops! Near a bench, you spot a shimmering wand that someone must have dropped.

get_wand.text: You pick up the beautiful silver wand. It tingles with magic in your hands!

classroom.text: In the classroom, Professor Starweaver is teaching a lesson about magical potions. 'Today we're making friendship potions!' she announces.

choices.text: Ask about the wand you found

ask_about_wand.text: Professor Starweaver's eyes light up! 'Oh my! That's my lost wand! Thank you so much for finding it. Here, take this special spell book as a reward.'

choices.text: Thank her and join the potion class
Ask if you can keep practicing with the wand

listen_class.text: You listen carefully as the professor explains how magical herbs can create wonderful effects when mixed properly.

ask_question.text: Professor Starweaver is impressed by your curiosity! She gives you a small bag of magical seeds. 'Plant these in our school garden!' she says.

choices.text: Go plant the seeds in the garden

potion_class.text: You help mix ingredients for a friendship potion. The mixture glows with a warm, golden light!

wand_practice.text: 'Of course, dear!' says the professor. 'But be careful - magic wands are powerful tools. Try casting a simple light spell.'

choices.text: Ask for help with the spell

light_spell.text: You wave the wand and speak the magic words. A beautiful ball of light appears above your head! All the students clap.

choices.text: Go show your friends in the garden

spell_help.text: Using the spell book, you learn the proper way to cast spells. The book teaches you a special growth spell!

choices.text: Use the growth spell in the garden

advanced_spell.text: With the help of the spell book, you successfully cast a spell that makes beautiful butterflies appear from thin air! You're becoming quite the wizard!

choices.text: Go to the library to learn more

garden.text: The school garden is full of amazing magical plants that glow and sing softly. Other students are here practicing their magic.

plant_seeds.text: You plant the magical seeds and they instantly grow into beautiful rainbow flowers that sparkle in the sunlight!

choices.text: Use growth spell to make them bigger

growth_spell.text: Your growth spell works perfectly! The rainbow flowers grow into a magnificent garden that fills the entire courtyard with beautiful colors and sweet music!

make_friends.text: You meet Emma and Sam, two friendly students who love magic just like you!

share_potion.text: You share the friendship potion with Emma and Sam. You all become the very best of friends instantly! You promise to have many magical adventures together.

show_magic.text: Your new friends are amazed by your magic skills! Emma knows a spell to make flowers dance, and Sam can make books float. Together you create a wonderful magic show!

garden_magic.text: You practice magic in the garden and accidentally make all the flowers start dancing! Everyone laughs and claps. You're getting really good at magic!

test_potion.text: You test the friendship potion by taking a small sip. Suddenly, you feel incredibly happy and notice that all the animals in the garden want to be your friend!

choices.text: Share the potion with other students
Make friends with the magical animals

library.text: The magical library has books that read themselves and shelves that reach up to the clouds! The librarian, Mrs. Bookworm, smiles at you warmly.

study_magic.text: Using your spell book, you learn incredible advanced magic! You can now cast spells that help others, heal plants, and create beautiful art from thin air!

choices.text: Use your magic to help the school

friendship_books.text: You find wonderful books about making friends and being kind. You learn that the best magic of all is friendship and kindness!

librarian_help.text: Mrs. Bookworm shows you a special section with books about your favorite subjects. She's so helpful that you decide to become a librarian helper!

celebration.text: The whole school celebrates your amazing garden! Professor Starweaver makes you the official Garden Keeper. You spend your days caring for magical plants and teaching others about nature magic!

best_friends_ending.text: You, Emma, and Sam become an unstoppable team of magical friends! You go on countless adventures together, always helping others and learning new magic. Your friendship is the strongest magic of all!

magic_show_ending.text: Your magic show is such a success that you become the school's official Entertainment Committee! You organize magical performances that make everyone smile and laugh every day!

animal_friends_ending.text: You become the school's Animal Whisperer! All the magical creatures love you, and you spend your time taking care of flying cats, singing birds, and dancing rabbits. What a magical life!

helpful_magic_ending.text: You use your advanced magic to help everyone at school! You help students with their homework, make the gardens more beautiful, and even help the teachers. You become known as the most helpful student ever!

librarian_ending.text: You become Mrs. Bookworm's best helper! You know where every book is and help all the students find exactly what they need. The library becomes the most popular place in school because of your kindness!
